page.title: 12FARMING/POLLUTION/EVENTS
page.content: {POLLUTION}:-Pesticides are washed into rivers, but this can take anything up to ten years. {DAIRY-FARMING}:-Woodgate often has to import milk when a lot is drunk. There are 76 dairy cows on the farm which give birth to 76 calves per annum. The farm produces 5200 gallons per year. The average lifespan of a cow is 8 years in which time it will produce 6 calves. Â£220 is spent on each cow each year. {FARM BUILDINGS}:-There are still old barns around, most oak-framed ones of the Napoleonic era are being replaced by concrete ones. There was a surge of modern farm buildings in the 1960's. EVENTS:-There are not many events, but annually the Ashdown weekend is held in the Danehill recreational grounds.
